generated_body: The article likely discusses the recent FDA warning issued to Dollar Tree regarding the sale of potentially unsafe drugs. Readers may expect an overview of the specific products involved and the reasons behind the FDA's concerns, including any potential health risks associated with these items. There may also be insights into the regulatory implications for Dollar Tree and how this situation reflects broader issues in the retail industry regarding product safety. The piece could also explore the potential impact on consumers, who may be urged to be more cautious about their purchases.
